com.vaadin.server
Class AmazonS3PersistenceMechanism

java.lang.Object
  com.vaadin.server.AmazonS3PersistenceMechanism
All Implemented Interfaces:
PersistenceMechanism
public class AmazonS3PersistenceMechanism
extends java.lang.Object
implements PersistenceMechanism

The implementation of the PersistenceMechanism to export and import VaadinSession objects from amazon S3 service.

Constructor Detail

AmazonS3PersistenceMechanism

public AmazonS3PersistenceMechanism(java.lang.String accessKey,
                                    java.lang.String secretKey,
                                    java.lang.String bucketName)
Parameters:
accessKey - The access-key for a amazon S3 service
secretKey - The secret-key for a amazon S3 service
bucketName - The name of the bucket for a amazon S3 service where VaadinSessions objects are and where they should be stored.

saveSession in interface PersistenceMechanism
Parameters:
